meanings.definition: A person who takes part in a conspiracy.
meanings.sent1: The conspirators planned to overthrow the government.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the conspirators before they could carry out their plan.
meanings.sent3: The conspirators thought they were being sneaky, but everyone knew their secret.
meanings.sent4: The group of conspirators worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The conspirators whispered in the shadows, plotting their next move.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are involved in a conspiracy.
meanings.sent1: The conspirators gathered in a dimly lit room to discuss their scheme.
meanings.sent2: The conspirators were careful not to attract any attention to their secret meetings.
meanings.sent3: The conspirators shared knowing glances, confident in their shared goal.
meanings.sent4: The web of conspirators extended far beyond what anyone had imagined.
meanings.sent5: The conspirators' unity was their greatest strength in carrying out their plan.
